Instance Property# padding

iOS 16.0+iPadOS 16.0+Mac Catalyst 16.0+macOS 13.0+tvOS 16.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
var padding: Float { get set }
```

**Required**

## [See Also](/documentation/CoreImage/CITextImageGenerator/padding#see-also)

### [Instance Properties](/documentation/CoreImage/CITextImageGenerator/padding#Instance-Properties)

[`var fontName: String`](/documentation/coreimage/citextimagegenerator/fontname)The name of the font to use for the generated text.**Required**

[`var fontSize: Float`](/documentation/coreimage/citextimagegenerator/fontsize)The size of the font to use for the generated text.**Required**

[`var scaleFactor: Float`](/documentation/coreimage/citextimagegenerator/scalefactor)The scale of the font to use for the generated text.**Required**

[`var text: String`](/documentation/coreimage/citextimagegenerator/text)The text to render.**Required**
